name: SFSafariViewController
desc: An object that provides a visible standard interface for browsing the web.

items.name: init(url: URL, configuration: SFSafariViewController.Configuration)
items.desc: Initializes and configures a Safari view controller that loads the specified URL.

items.name: class SFSafariViewController.Configuration
items.desc: A configuration object that defines how a Safari view controller should be initialized.

items.name: init(url: URL)
items.desc: Initializes a Safari view controller that loads the specified URL.

items.name: var delegate: SFSafariViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: An object that provides behavior for the Safari view controller's Done and Action buttons.

items.name: protocol SFSafariViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: A protocol used to implement custom event handling for a Safari view controller.

items.name: var configuration: SFSafariViewController.Configuration
items.desc: A copy of the Safari view controllerâ€™s initialized configuration.

items.name: var preferredBarTintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color to tint the background of the navigation bar and the toolbar.

items.name: var preferredControlTintColor: UIColor?
items.desc: The color to tint the control buttons on the navigation bar and the toolbar.
